name: Aegis
skill: Deals 1228/1468 DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a high chance of inflicting Stun.
ability: All melee allies take slightly less DMG.
Reflects 10% of the DMG taken back to attacker.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a shield that can fend off every type of evil and calamity. The shield was originally made to protect the beloved daughter of the god of the sky. Today, her powers are as strong as ever, and getting past her solid defenses is no small feat. However, she is a hardcore clean freak who can't stand dirt. She takes off running the minute she thinks someone is going to rub their grime off on her. When there's no escape she tries to destroy the source of contamination, what—or whoever that might be. You don't want to see the look on her face when someone actually manages to get her dirty.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 31/03/17 - 31/05/17
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

main: "Don't come any closer! There's a speck of dust on your shoulder!"
skill: "Don't touch me with those filthy hands!"
summon: "I'll be leaving the minute things get dirty. You know that, right?"
